title: 4 Gifts X-mas, MTH, Who Invented, Comedy Roulette, Right or Wrong, Games You Can't Play, Closing Remarks and more.
itunes:title: 4 Gifts X-mas, MTH, Who Invented, Comedy Roulette, Right or Wrong, Games You Can't Play, Closing Remarks and more.
description:
There are preferences when it comes to gifts during the holiday season. J. Anthony Brown murders another one in the spirit of Kirk Franklin. We have inventions that make us thankful, but who invented it? Comedy Roulette returns. How stupid is Fool #1? Right or Wrong tells us. There are certain games that you must avoid during the holiday season. Today in Closing Remarks, Big Dog talks about the importance of not downplaying your dreams and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
